articles.author: Caroline  Linton
articles.title: Sen. Tom Cotton says new Venezuelan government cannot "continue Nicolás Maduro's ways" - CBS News
articles.description: President Trump "wants to give them a chance to turn the page in Venezuela and to help America achieve our policy goals there," Sen. Tom Cotton said on "Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan."
articles.content: Sen. Tom Cotton, the chair of the Senate Intelligence Committee, said Sunday that the U.S. has to "make sure the people that are in charge of the apparatus of the Venezuelan government are not going … [+2614 chars]

articles.author: Elisabeth Buchwald
articles.title: Trump wants the US oil industry to thrive in Venezuela again. That won’t be easy - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump said he’s counting on American companies to rebuild Venezuela’s battered oil industry.
articles.content:
